title: Use the NHS ORD API to fetch NHS organisations — t_api_organisations
text: Queries NHS Organisation Data Service API (Organisation Reference Data - ORD) https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/organisation-data-service-ord

title: Use the NHS ORD API to fetch NHS organisations — t_api_organisations
Use the NHS ORD API to fetch NHS organisations — t_api_organisations
text: role character. One c("NHS TRUST", "NHS TRUST SITE", "ICB", "SUB ICB LOCATION", "GP"). Defaults "NHS TRUST". include_inactive logical. Include inactive trusts results? Defaults FALSE.
